reviews.text: Price too high for this terrible, unclean room.
reviews.title: Almost a shame

reviews.text: How can this be a 4 star hotel even in Belgrade???????
reviews.title: Very old, but ok for Serbia

reviews.text: We were put up in Hotel Palace when our flight out of Belgrade was cancelled.
reviews.title: If this is 4 Star, what's 3 Star like?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed in the hotel for two nights while attending a wedding in Belgrade. We had reserved a standard double room, but apparently due to overbookings we got a junior suite for the same price (100€/night).
reviews.title: Quite expensive compared to the quality

reviews.text: The room was fairly clean and the bed comfortable. However considering the price and the fact that the normal price for the junior suite would have been even higher, the hotel did definitely not meet the expectations. The room seemed very old and rundown with the toilet window not closing and the tv-stand being windy. It seems that the pictures on the hotel website are taken from some already renovated rooms, since on the pictures the bathroom looks newer.
reviews.title: This place is ideal 3rd visit 2007

reviews.text: If you do not let the fairly high price bother you, the hotel was OK. The breakfast was decent and we got some service from the personnel (again, comparing to the overall standard of service in Belgrade). One thing to note however was that there did not seem to be air conditioning in the hotel, so the room was quite warm. Also the windows were not very soundproof so the noise from the nearby street made sleeping a bit uneasy.
reviews.title: OK, but 4-stars is VERY generous

reviews.text: As a final positive note, the TV in the room showed the Eurovision Song Contest live, although in Serbian =)
reviews.title: Perfectly fine.. as long as you know what to expect

reviews.text: This Hotel is fine right in the city centre.Very easy to get to Bars and shops etc.This is my 3rd time going this year for another 10 days.The hotel has character,staff are friendly, and there is plenty of choice for Breakfast.The rooms are clean i have even booked an Apartment this time.No problem,i have relation in the
reviews.title: Nothing palatial but perfectly adequate

likes.disliked: — no hairdryer and a tiny tiny bathroom
